article_title: Texas lags behind most states in lung cancer surgery
article_text:
Texas lags behind most states in lung cancer surgery

Photo: SCIEPRO, Getty Images/Brand X Rates of surgery for patients with stage 1 or 2 lung cancer in...

Despite being home to some of the best hospitals in the country, Texas falls well behind other states in the percentage of patients with early lung cancer who undergo surgery to cure the disease, according to a study released last week at a major cancer conference.

og.description: Study finds Texas lags behind other states in curative surgery rates for patients with early stage lung cancer. Texas also had the largest disparity in surgery rates between blacks and whites.
